text: Jose Andres Blanco Sanchez (born April 13, 1958 in Madrid) is a cyclist from Spain. He has a disability: He is a type LC3 cyclist. He competed at the 2000 Summer Paralympics. He finished second in the Individual Pursuit track LC3 race. He finished third in the Road LC3 race. == References == Category:Spanish cyclists Category:Living people Category:1958 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:Politicians from Madrid
title: José Andres Blanco Sánchez
